extendedInfo.description: A FREE, FUN spelling and learning game for all ages of Toddlers, Kids and Children up to the age of 10! Also improves your Childs hand-eye co-ordination as they drag the images to their final resting place! Tablet Support!Over 100 simple and popular words for your child to learn!! And more coming soon!!Your Toddler and/or Kid will spend endless hours of fun DRAGGING the big and colorful letters into their correct slots. The dragging action will also help build your Childs hand-eye co-ordination! Once all the letters are in the correct slots then a word will be spelled out by the in-game voiceover! Your Child will also love the big, colorful images that illustrate the meaning of each word!Even Adults will love the animations, images and satisfying "click" that happens when a letter is placed in its correct slot!7" and 8" and 10" Tablet Supported!!!*** FEATURES ***â All content is 100% FREEâ Kids learn the letters of the Alphabetsâ Kids learn the spelling to popular and simple wordsâ Kids learn how to pronounce the letters of the alphabet and the wordsâ Kids learn to associate words with their imagesâ Large and Colorful letters for your Kid/Toddler to drag around the screenâ Letters can be dragged across the screen onto targets, helping to improve your Kid hand-eye co-ordinationâ Cute and Colorful images of each Voiceover!â Animation of each word when your Kid correctly completes the word. They will love the animation!â Voiceovers to help your Kid to learn how to say each Letter and Wordâ High Quality Imagesâ Kids and Parents love it!â Building vocabulary has never been soo much funâ Professional voiceovers recorded in production studioâ 7" and 8" and 10" Tablet Supported!!!Your Child will love the bright colors, unique sound effects, exciting animations and dragging letters around the screen. Give it a try! You won't regret it!Building strong English vocabulary has never been so exciting for preschoolers and toddlers. Complexity of words is perfect for ages 1 to 10!

reviews.title: Two year bold loves it
reviews.comment: My two year old loves this. She will bring me my phone saying game mommy. It never tires her because she is learning words what they look like where they go and sees the picture. I recommend this for a very hands on activity.
reviews.author: Alisha Gautreaux

reviews.title: Wish it had more
reviews.comment: I wish that this game has an alphabet drag and drop like the math and numbers game has the count by 1s drag and drop numbers.
reviews.author: Megan Pearce

reviews.title: Its an awesome app!!!
reviews.comment: My 20 month old is addicted! I love how much she enjoys it! We play it together all the time. Works beautifully on Samsung galaxy s2!!! Thanks so much!!!!

reviews.title: Okay.
reviews.comment: My grandchild loves this. I paid to have no ads. But the \"locked\" button does not work, which is quite frustrating for a two year old.
